My Services

Senior Athlete Portraits

To many senior athletes, the time spentcompeting on the field or the court will be some of the best times of their lives. I'm here to capture senior portraits that will help embody those moments for a lifetime. My dramatic and action-packed senior will surely be a hit with both the parents and seniors.

Media Days

Amazing Media Days photos are essential to have! They are a great asset to any team that wants to improve the look of their social media. They also can be an excellent way to raise money for high school booster programs by selling print, buttons, and other items to parents and loved ones!

Book Service

Action photos

Without a doubt, Action photos are the hardest thing to capture because the moment happens in a blink of an eye! So let me do all the work and capture that 3 pointer, touchdown pass, or the gaming winning goal, so you can sit back, relax, and enjoy the game!
